plethora.core
Class Ple_Terrain

java.lang.Object
  plethora.core.Ple_Terrain

public class Ple_Terrain
extends java.lang.Object

Terrain Class based on a grid condition. It contains a data buffer that allows to store different layers of data obtained from images or other sources. This data can be red by Agents (Ple_Agents) or used for height or color.

Author:
jomasan
